thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Better than expected
thread.title_full: Better than expected - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Melissa L
title: Better than expected
text: We arrived super early (around 7am) and were hoping to just secure our luggage till check in. The gentlemen informed us they had a room, though it was a larger room than we booked. He offered to upgrade us at no charge. The room was clean and spacious. It included a separate seating area and a refrigerator. There was little outside noise heard from the room. The staff was very friendly and the location was easily accessible to the metro. We will definitely look to book here again in the future.
